TopicTitle: The UM-1 Ultra Manueverable Stunt Plane

Articles.Content:
I was experimenting with ultra maneuverable designs and the results were great, and the UM-1 was born. This has almost VTOL like properties with the way it maneuvers and can pull a 180 degree turn at any speed extremely quick. It has a max speed of around 1000 m/s. What I show below is a few stunts I did with it, surprisingly easily. It also has a very low stall speed. Without further adieu, here's the video!

Please subscribe for more content!

 

Please give feedback below on what I should make next!

 

Edited February 6, 2016 by AquaAlmond Productions
It's also very stable with SAS off and is all stock! I'm think of building a SSTO that can get to space in under 60 seconds next? What do you think?
